section.name: Recent news
section.p: This release includes the following features

ul.li: Support for all Astah UML editions
Support for custom code insertions. See Reference documentation for further details
JPA2 and Spring Built-in directive. Automates annotation generation. Please read JPA2/Spring-Data tutorial

section.p: You can also go the BitBucket issue tracker to display all changes
This release includes the following features

ul.li: New GUI to give better feedback and tracability about the code generation process

section.p: This release includes the following features

ul.li: Utility (@util) built-in directive that will helps querying UML class, attributes, operations easily. This directive will have more and more functions in the future
Java (@java) built-in directive that give a set of macros to make code generation easier in this language. For the moment, only a few macros are developed

section.p: This release is a milestone. This means that it may not be completely stable. There will be 2 more milestone release before 1.1.0 is officially released. See Roadmap for more details
Web site's skin has been updated as menus were not opening using firefox.
Web site has been updated : templating documentation is now available online as well as full PDF documentation.
Welcome to our new website, anycode.labulle.in !
